## 9. Versionamento

`git status`: mostra o estado do repositório

```{r eval=FALSE}
$ git status

On branch master
nothing to commit, working tree clean
```

![](img/git_states.png)

## 9. Versionamento

`git status`: mostra o estado do repositório

```{r eval=FALSE}
$ git status

# On branch master
# Your branch is ahead of 'origin/master' by 2 commits.
#   (use "git push" to publish your local commits)
#   nothing to commit, working tree clean
```
